description: This file declares the interface for telemetry bus message sending, including initialization, event creation with different data types, and uninitialization functions. It includes external dependencies and defines functions used to send telemetry data signals within a system.

methods.name: t2_init
methods.description: Initializes the telemetry event sending module with a unique system-wide component name.

methods.name: t2_event_s
methods.description: Sends a telemetry event with string marker and value.

methods.name: t2_event_f
methods.description: Sends a telemetry event with string marker and floating-point value.

methods.name: t2_event_d
methods.description: Sends a telemetry event with string marker and integer value.

methods.name: t2_uninit
methods.description: Uninitializes the telemetry event sending module.
